metadata.name: Wings of Hope
metadata.description:
Life may not be fair for everyone. Although our choices guide us, sometimes we may encounter situations where our choices are not enough.

Think of a lonely person struggling with life and in need of help...Maybe the only thing he hasn't lost in the face of all these difficulties is a big heart full of love. He shares his sustenance with the seagulls and feeds them.

This photograph was exhibited in a national photography competition.

Artist: Uğur Özdemir
Camera: Canon 60D
Lens: Sigma 10-20mm 
Dimensions:6000x3600 
Resolution: 300 dpi 
Location: İstanbul, Turkey
Date: 29th December 2019
Edition: 1/1
